ygData.subject: Inner Conflict
ygData.msgSnippet: Havotron flew out of MT. Fuji heading West.  Not Far to go to reach the Decepticon base. Needlenose flew right behind.  Looking to Spinister he whispered God

Subject: Inner Conflict

Havotron flew out of MT. Fuji heading West.  Not Far to go to reach the Decepticon base.  

Needlenose flew right behind.  Looking to Spinister he whispered "God he is obsessed with power."

Scrapper flew behind them in robot form, hopefully with the rest of the Contructicons behind.

0-------------------------------------------------------------------------0

Tremor drove to the edge of the main island they were based on.  "Water, great, now what Heater"

Heater jumped out looking.  "Are  you really that dense Tremor."  Heater transformed to his dual photon pistol.  Firing off seven shots taking out trees. "Tiptop attach those to Tremors treads, we are going to float across."

Tremor looked at Heater, then transformed.  "Or you know, we could just like fly across"  Grabbing Heater and  Tiptop in their respective weapon forms he jumped into the air flying off his base island and towards another group of islands somewhat south-east of them.
0-------------------------------------------------------------------------0

Darkwing and Dreadwind looked to each other.  "Well these two don't seem interested in surrendering control, but they will when Havotron is done with them" Dreadwind said.

"Ya whatever" came the reply from Darkwing.

"Lets go"

"AWW slag, I have to join with you again"

"Lets just go you pile of rust."

They both jumped into the air forming two jets, then the two jets formed one.  They blasted off to the east almost at the Decepticon base.
